meanings.sent1: The putative leader of the group was always the first to speak up.
meanings.sent2: The putative owner of the house was nowhere to be found.
meanings.sent3: The putative magician's tricks never failed to amuse the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her putative talent for painting was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The putative treasure hidden in the old castle captured everyone's imagination.

meanings.definition: Generally considered or reputed to be.
meanings.sent1: The putative culprit in the mystery turned out to be innocent.
meanings.sent2: The putative winner of the race celebrated with joy.
meanings.sent3: The putative genius behind the invention was actually a cat!
meanings.sent4: His putative wealth was just a facade to impress others.
meanings.sent5: The putative hero of the story faced many challenges along the way.
